events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was involved in a minor collision at the intersection of 5th and Main.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the reported vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to manage your vehicle accident claim and will contact you shortly.
We officially acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and are reviewing the details.
Please submit the police report and photographs of the damaged vehicle for further processing.
All requested documents including medical bills and vehicle repair estimates have been successfully submitted.
An investigation into the circumstances of the car accident has commenced by our claims team.
Our investigation has been completed and liability for the vehicle collision has been determined.
A settlement offer for your auto accident claim has been proposed, covering repair and medical costs.
You provided positive feedback regarding the responsiveness and clarity during the claim process.
Your auto accident claim has been fully approved based on the investigation and submitted documents.
The approved settlement amount has now been issued to your bank account for vehicle repairs.
Following payment issuance and confirmation, your auto accident claim is officially closed.
